Name: Arcane Inferno
Story Background: After centuries of study, the most powerful mages learned to harness the raw energy of the cosmos.
Ability: Arcane Inferno deals 3 damage to any target. If you control a creature with power 5 or greater, Arcane Inferno deals 5 damage instead.
Appearance Description: The card art shows a swirling vortex of fiery arcane energy, crackling with power and ready to unleash devastation upon its target.
